name: Mayday (itch) (NakojaKumori)
description:
A realm of parallel worlds threatened by the Shikari. 

ISO or Keeper; your role and your fate is your choice. 

A soldier from Parallel 4. ISO is the resistance against the tyrannical rule of the Citadel. To the Citadel the ISO are deserters, to the few still clinging to hope, the ISO is their salvation.

The keepers of order between the seven parallel worlds. You are tasked to find and recover a relic the Shikari have uncovered -The Orb - rumoured to be able to collapse the gates between the parallel worlds.
